entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a professor who stopped talking abruptly and discovered that someone had broken into his office.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is the caretaker who looked down at the foot of the stairs with Snape.

entities.name: mad-eye moody
entities.description: Moody is a professor who limped into sight wearing his old traveling cloak and leaning on his staff.

entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is the poltergeist who was throwing things around as usual.

relationships.description: Snape and Filch looked down at the foot of the stairs together.
Moody limped into sight in front of Snape.
Peeves was throwing things around as usual, and someone broke into Snape's office.
